about_the_game:
READY TO MANAGE YOUR DREAM PUB?

The Pub Life invites you to experience the journey of building and managing your own pub from scratch! Starting with an old shop, you'll face the challenge of transforming it into the venue of your dreams. Satisfy your customers and grow your business, but beware: running a successful pub requires smart planning and decisive management.

CLEAN THE PLACE AND GET STARTED

As soon as you move into your pub, start by cleaning up. Don’t get lost in the dust and mess; a clean pub means happy customers! Players can use their starting budget wisely to purchase their first supplies and begin with a simple menu.

PROGRESS AND DISCOVER RECIPES

Level up your business to unlock higher-quality ingredients. Learn new recipes, improve your cocktail-making skills, and create unique menus that will impress your customers. Let your creativity shine to make your pub a local favorite!

KEEP THE BALANCE

Running a pub isn’t just about the menu. Manage your stock carefully, plan your budget, and ensure you meet customer demands. Spend wisely and approach expensive investments with caution—otherwise, you might find yourself on the brink of bankruptcy!

REALISTIC SIMULATION

The Pub Life brings the challenges and rewards of running a real pub to life. With a detailed management system, diverse recipe options, and an engaging venue-building process, it’s an experience that will pull you in and keep you hooked.

Are you ready? Build, manage, and transform your pub into the most loved spot in town!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game offers a virtual pub management experience and includes:

- Gameplay mechanics involving the sale of alcohol.

- Scenes that feature alcohol as part of the simulation elements, without promoting its consumption.

The game is designed as an entertaining management simulation and does not intend to encourage real-life alcohol use. Players are encouraged to make responsible decisions as a pub owner.

name: The Pub Life Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 08 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Open your own pub with The Pub Life and keep your customers happy with delicious food and drinks. Enjoy this exciting simulation experience solo or with a friend. Unlock higher-quality products and expand your pub to build the best establishment around!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Spanish - Latin America
